name: Stair Dummy Crash Test Simulator 3D
description:
Break the dummies into pieces with our new Stair Dummy Crash Test Simulator 3D game! Drop them from the different kinds of stairs and stairways using different vehicles, tap the screen and smash them into the walls and have fun!
Now it’s time to start a crash test experiment! Work for the security company making crash test dummies and mannequins; test all sorts of stairs and stairways trying to prove how secure it is! Wreck, smash, run into the wall, destroy and dismount all sorts of dummies using skateboard, car, bike or everything else! Perform different tricks and stunts, crash into the walls, destroy your doll with each available vehicle and have fun demolishing everything on your way!
The more damage you cause, the more points you earn! Try different types of stairs and stairways to show everybody the real power of destruction! Perform amazing stunts and jumps trying to dismount dolls entirely with this dummy crash simulator made for all tastes and ages! Your mission is to wreck, crash, demolish and destroy with Stair Dummy Crash Test Simulator 3D!
Earn points for successful crashes and unlock new locations, stairs, obstacles and even skins for your dummies and mannequins! Get ready for ultimate mannequin destruction in fantastic stairways! Become the best crash tester ever and have fun!
Stair Dummy Crash Test Simulator 3D features:
• Mannequin stairs crash test simulator
• Wide range of different vehicles and obstacles for more fun
• Colorful environment
• Amazing 3D graphics
Try amazing dummy crash simulator and break all the stickman mannequin bones to get maximum points in this crash testing fever! Enjoy demolition fun with Stair Dummy Crash Test Simulator 3D!
